episodes.title: Jehovah's witness mother confronted
episodes.description: I am the step mother of three beautiful girls whose mother is a Jehovah's witness. She is telling the children that there are demons in my home. They are terrified. My 3 children will not sleep in their own rooms because they have been told there are demons in our home by my step children. This woman also told my step children that nothing we buy them is allowed to go home with them because demons can attach themselves to their things and they can bring them home with them. This is the first time I have confronted her about this situation....
